subdisciplines.name: Molecular Biology
subdisciplines.description: The branch of biology that deals with the structure and function of the macromolecules (e.g. proteins and nucleic acids) essential to life.

subdisciplines.name: Enzymology
subdisciplines.description: The study of enzymes, the proteins that catalyze chemical reactions within living organisms.

subdisciplines.name: Metabolism
subdisciplines.description: The set of chemical reactions that occur within a living organism in order to maintain life.

subdisciplines.name: Proteomics
subdisciplines.description: The large-scale study of proteins, particularly their structures and functions.
